title: Interpretation of the symbol of eating ice cream in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of the symbol of eating ice cream in a dream for single people. Here is the interpretation of the symbol of eating ice cream in a dream for single people. We in reality or even in evil, represent the same thing in a dream. The visions that a person sees derive the meaning of their interpretation from their meaning in our real life, so in our article today we will discuss the interpretation of ice cream in a dream for single people. Interpretation of ice cream in a dream for a single woman by Ibn Sirin Despite the different and multiple interpretations about seeing ice cream in a dream, especially for those who are not married However, because the dream in which ice cream is often incomprehensible, interpretations vary depending on the condition of the ice cream in the dream and the dreamer’s condition. Ibn Sirin identified some cases as follows: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is eating delicious, delicious and fresh ice cream, this means that this girl will achieve the dreams and aspirations that she has longed for for a long time by God’s command. But if the unmarried girl had She saw in her dream that a group of young children were eating ice cream in a state of happiness, then she would have heard a lot of good and joyful news on her way to the fortuneteller. But seeing melted ice cream in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates many problems, sorrows and fears that the dreamer will suffer from But if she sees a lot of ice cream in her dream, but she cannot eat it, this is a sign that she will suffer from great judgment and disappointment and will not be able to achieve her dreams and aspirations, and God is Great. And he knows better. Spoiled ice cream in the dream of an unmarried woman with a foul and unpleasant smell is a sign of gloom, sadness and failure that will haunt the dreamer. Ice cream in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen believes that ice cream in the dream of an unmarried girl is a dream with a good and praiseworthy interpretation, and it has many One of the good and happy interpretations, because it is a sign of great kindness, abundant food, and many happy and good news. On their way to the seer. Ibn Shaheen believes that fresh ice cream with a good and delicious taste is an indication that the fortuneteller will receive a lot of beautiful news and good words about her and her morals, which will be conveyed by the lovers around her. As for the unique girl who eats ice cream in her dream, this indicates She will achieve her dreams and ambitions by God’s command. As for the girl who sees the ice cream containing fruits, but this fruit corresponds to its season in reality, this is a sign of good nutrition and abundance, but if the fruits inside the ice cream are out of season, this means: summer fruit What we dream about in the winter is an unpleasant vision and has no other interpretation. Al-Nabulsi’s individual interpretation of seeing ice cream in a dream. Al-Nabulsi agreed with Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen on some issues and interpretations and disagreed on some of them, including for example: Al-Nabulsi sees ice cream in general in a dream. An unmarried girl has many good connotations, but the topic of ice cream turns the interpretation upside down.Ice cream

title: Is divorce in a dream death?

preview.html: Is divorce in a dream death? Ibn Yusreen explains that a sick person who sees in a dream that he is divorcing his wife three times, this indicates the approaching time of this man and God Almighty knows. When a healthy person who is not sick sees that he is divorcing his wife three times in a dream, this indicates that he will get rid of Of all the problems that he will face in the coming period. Many interpret that seeing a divorce shows the goodness that befalls the person and that there will be changes in his life that will change him for the better. If a man sees that he divorced his wife in a dream and his wife is sick, this indicates the woman’s recovery from illness, but if he divorces her Three times in a dream, this indicates the difficulty of her recovery from her illness. There are many interpretations that can be presented in interpreting the vision of divorce in a dream, and they can be identified through the following lines: Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of divorce in a dream indicates separation from work, and if the divorce is not Certainly, this indicates the possibility of returning to work again. If the divorce is final, this indicates an irreversible separation, whether it is separation from work or separation from the husband. When you see a man divorcing his wife in a clear and final divorce in a dream, this indicates a change in the situation. Without returning to the first situation, as the first divorce in a dream indicates a return to the first situation. Divorcing a wife in a dream indicates the difficulties that this wife faces in public life. Interpretation of divorce in a dream for a man in a dream: Seeing a man exploding in a dream shows many clues that could Identify it through the following: Seeing a divorced man in a dream indicates the health problems that will hinder him and the fears that he will face in the coming period of his life. A man who divorced his wife twice in a dream indicates that there are many disagreements and problems at work between the dreamer and his manager or other person. Problems that bother him. If a man sees that he divorced his wife three times in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer is approaching God Almighty and pleases his Lord, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a man sees that he is divorcing his wife to marry another, this indicates that the man will bid farewell to poverty. And he enjoys abundant livelihood and abundant money. If a married husband sees that he has divorced his wife before the court and feels upset and sad after the divorce and feels that his condition is bad, this indicates that this man will face many problems, some bad changes that he will face. His next life, and some of the obstacles and obstacles that he will go through, so he must be careful. Interpretation of requesting a divorce from the wife in a dream. There are certain connotations and interpretations when a man sees his wife asking him for a divorce in a dream, and they can be presented as follows: Many interpret that seeing a woman’s desire in a dream to divorce Her husband and asking him to do so indicates that the dreamer’s circumstances do not help him in judging worldly matters. Asking for a divorce in a dream from the wife, in the event that the wife becomes pregnant, this indicates the woman’s need for help. The wife asking for a divorce in a dream

title: The 20 most accurate interpretations of seeing an ant in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The most important thing that commentators said about seeing an ant in a dream. The interpretation of seeing an ant in a dream includes both good and bad symbols, and the interpretation varies according to the size of the ant, its color, and the location of its appearance in the dream. Seeing an ant in a dream An ant in a dream is a symbol that indicates the number of children the dreamer will have in the future. If he sees three ants in his dream, he may give birth to three children, and if a pregnant woman sees two ants walking together, she may give birth to twin children or God will give her another child to bear after the baby, she will give birth to her soon. Give birth. And if the dreamer sees a lot of ants in his dream, then he is lucky with a large inheritance that he will receive within a few days or weeks. If the dreamer dreams of an ant that chases him and causes him discomfort in the dream, then the vision indicates problems in his work that will continue with him for some time and because of them, he may He feels the feelings of stress and anxiety that create a feeling for him. Anxiety and despair. If the dreamer sees himself happy in a dream while an ant emerges from any part of his body, whether from his eye or from his ear, then he will die in the path of God and be martyred, and whoever was a witness. He will enter heaven. And enjoy its bliss, your way to winning the future. When an ant walks in a dream on the body of a sick dreamer, he will soon be among the dead. Seeing an ant in a dream by Ibn Sirin If the dreamer sees an ant hole in a dream and sees an ant emerging from it, he will leave this world and die in the near future and may die. More than one person if he sees more than one ant coming out of a hole. Ibn Sirin said that ants interpret the dreamer as a hesitant and hesitant person. He is cautious and does not provide security for anyone easily. And if the dreamer sees many ants entering his house without instilling fear in the hearts of the owners of the house. Rather, he enters quietly and in order, for this is his livelihood and benefit that he earns and he enjoys stability and comfort from it. If an ant stings one dreamer in his dream without him being seriously hurt or feeling unbearable pain, then here the ant is interpreted by a girl who will become his wife in the future. The dreamer’s vision of an ant entering his house It means a blessing and a very good person who supports his home, but if you leave it, it means that the livelihood will leave the house and the spirits will also leave it, and someone could die, and the scene is a symbol of confusion in life, and the lack of clarity of the goals and steps of life that the dreamer is taking, and he knows what he has and what he has in His life. Seeing an ant in a dream for a single woman. If the dreamer sees one or more ant standing on her foot or leg, then she is an active girl and never neglects her work from which she earns money. Despite her continuous diligence in her life, which increases her feeling of weakness, the dream gives her good news that it increases money. It relieves anxiety. If she sees a lot of ants, these are many opportunities that will be available to her in the future, whether at work, marriage, or study, which means that she can find many jobs that she welcomes and choose only the job that suits her and suits her. With her ability, she will marry a young man who has a lot of money and a distinguished personality, through research, diligence, and cooperation with others to achieve their interests, and she will live with him in stability and peace.

title: The 8 most important interpretations of seeing a house in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing an old house in a dream? An indication of many problems and troubles that the dreamer is going through. What does it mean to see a house with open windows? Evidence of good luck. What is the interpretation of a married woman seeing in a dream that she is renovating the house? A sign of fixing all the bad things in her life. The interpretation of a pregnant woman seeing in a dream that she lives in an old house? Evidence of good health, but it will be difficult to give birth. What is the interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream wandering in an old house? It shows many difficulties that she will face in her life. Interpretation of a dream about a house by Ibn Sirin. A new house in A dream indicates good health. So, seeing an old house in a dream is an indication of many problems and troubles that the dreamer is going through. Seeing yourself buying a house in a dream is a sign of a beautiful woman. Then, seeing someone in a dream that he is in an unfamiliar house This is evidence of the grave. Seeing a person in a dream that he is building a house indicates success. So, seeing a house burning in a dream is a sign of goodness and blessing that prevails over the dreamer. Seeing a dream about a man’s houseIf a man sees in a dream a house with light, This indicates that his wife is a good woman with high morals. Then if a man sees a dark house in a dream, this is evidence of his wife’s bad behavior. If a man sees a closed house and cannot enter it, this indicates his wife’s stinginess. Interpretation of a dream about a house for people aloneIf a girl sees in her dream That she is wandering around in an old house, this indicates many difficulties that she will face in her life, especially in the emotional relationship that she is going through. So, seeing a new house in the dream of an unmarried woman is a sign of a new life that she will move into. If he sees a house with furniture and furnishings This indicates that he will get married soon. Hence, seeing a house with open windows is a sign of good luck. Selling the house indicates the salvation of problems, the end of worries, and the disappearance of distress. Seeing a dream house for a married woman If a married woman sees an old house in a dream, this means that she is going through a crisis Dangerous finances. So, seeing a new house in a married woman’s dream is a sign of kindness. Entering a new house in a married woman’s dream is a sign of ample sustenance. If a married woman dreams that she is repairing the house, this is a sign of correcting all the corruptions in her life. Then if she sees that she is destroying an old house, this indicates the salvation of the negatives present in her life. Interpretation of a dream about a house for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman dreams that she is living in an old house, this is a sign of good health, but she will face difficulty in giving birth. So seeing a house in a dream A pregnant woman is evidence of the woman's safety and ease of pregnancy. If he sees a new house, this indicates the presence of a female. An old house in a pregnant woman's dream is a sign of good health and relief from distress.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a mother drowning in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a mother drowning in a dream. Are you worried about seeing someone drowning? In the following lines we present an interpretation of a dream about a mother drowning in a dream according to the interpretations of scholars and translators and not personal interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a mother drowning in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a mother drowning in a dream could be a sign of committing sins And God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees his mother drowning in a dream about problems, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If an unmarried young man sees his mother drowning in a dream, this may be evidence of sins and transgressions, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my sister drowning in the sea in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister drowning in the sea in A dream could be a sign of material loss, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees his relatives drowning, this may be a sign that he is in trouble, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married man sees their relatives drowning, this may indicate crises, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a woman drowning in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a wife drowning in a dream. Scientists do not have specific explanations for seeing a wife drowning. However, drowning in a dream can represent a problem, and God knows the unseen. When a single girl sees herself drowning in a dream, it may be a sign of a financial crisis, and God knows best. If a married man sees himself drowning in a dream, this may be tantamount to committing sins. God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of a bus sinking in the sea in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a car sinking in the sea in a dream could be evidence of insistence on making a mistake, and God knows the unseen. When you see the car sinking and people do not escape from it, it may be a sign of staying away from sins and transgressions, God willing. If the dreamer sees The car sinks in a dream, this may indicate lost opportunities, and God knows the unseen. When you see a car sinking in a dream, this can lead to liberation from hypocrisy, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams about someone trying to strangle me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about someone trying to drown me in a dream. We do not have specific interpretations to see. However, seeing yourself drowning in a dream could be a sign of negative feelings within you, and God knows the unseen. When you see yourself drowning in a dream, it may be a sign of a problem, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. But if the dreamer sees himself drowning in the fullness of the sea in a dream, it may be That is a sign of goodness and living, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams of my beloved drowning in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of my beloved drowning in a dream. Drowning can indicate problems and crises, and God knows the unseen. Seeing drowning in the sea can represent a failure to achieve goals, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees a human being. Escaping from drowning in a dream, as this may be a sign of goodness and freedom from distress, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees someone escaping from drowning in a dream, this may mean that she is getting rid of anxiety and sadness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my son drowning in a well in Dream interpretation of a dream about my son drowning in a well. In a dream, a child drowning may lead to unwanted problems, and God knows best. Whereas if the dreamer sees saving a child in a dream, this may be a sign of material changes.

title: The detailed interpretation of seeing engagement in a dream in all its forms, the interpretation of seeing my sister’s engagement in a dream, the interpretation of seeing my friend’s engagement and seeing my daughter’s engagement in a dream

preview.html: Seeing an engagement in a dream: Engagement is the covenant through which marriage is concluded, and engagement represents the stage in which the two parties are allowed to get closer and get to know each other better. There is no doubt that seeing an engagement in a dream is one of the visions that leave a good impression on a person when he wakes up from sleep, but what is the meaning of this dream? What does that mean exactly? In this article you will find all the cases and symbols of seeing an engagement in a dream. Seeing an engagement in a dream Seeing an engagement in a dream means greatness, honor, high birth, achieving the desired goal and achieving the goal after hard work and perseverance. If a person sees his engagement in a dream, this indicates hard effort and hard work to achieve The desired goal and participation in projects and experiments aimed at achieving achievement in all possible ways. Participation is an indicator of important news that will change many things, and this news, regardless of its content, carries many very important messages to the viewer. This vision indicates a desire to change the existing conditions and replace them with others. It is commensurate with the conditions and requirements of the next stage. If the dreamer sees that he is engaged to a woman, this indicates that he will obtain a benefit from her or enter into a partnership with her, and the return from it will be divided equally between the two parties. Seeing commitment is an indicator of the changes and changes that occur in a person’s life, so there is no room for To settle down or stand at a certain stage. If someone proposes to a Jewish woman and marries her, this indicates the improvement of worldly affairs at the expense of future affairs, or professionalization of a profession that brings him a lot of money but pushes him to commitment. Mistakes and sins. Seeing engagement in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that commitment in a dream indicates the achievement of purpose and pleasure, the opening of closed doors, and the end of the state of chaos that has exhausted the mind and shaken certainty. This vision is a sign of a world that satisfies a person and we wish you success and good news and reap a lot. Of benefits and benefits. Seeing a link in a dream also symbolizes hard work to bring the soul out of its depression and distress and begin implementing some projects that were previously scheduled to be implemented, but were disrupted due to unusual circumstances. On the other hand, this vision indicates removing pessimism and despair from Heart, plant hope and activity, change the outlook on reality, and take big steps forward. If one sees that he is inviting all his relatives and friends to his engagement party, this symbolizes the presence of an important event in the coming days and it is not necessary for the event to be special for a wedding or engagement party. It indicates Seeing commitment also refers to transformations in life, such as moving from one situation to another, or from one social situation to another, or traveling far and achieving some well-defined goals. The vision may indicate a harsh statement or words that are not implemented, as if a decision has been made and there is no way to change it or deviate from it. The vision of engagement is a reflection of some of the qualities that distinguish a man, such as eloquence, speaking the truth in gatherings, and abstaining from hypocrisy.

title: Learn about the interpretation of the martyr in a dream from Ibn Sirin, hugging the martyr in a dream, and kissing the martyr in a dream.

preview.html: Witness in a dream: A martyr is a person who sacrifices his life and soul for the sake of God. God mentioned the martyr in more than one place in His beloved book, and the Holy Qur’an contains verses about martyrs due to the high status of martyrs in the eyes of God, but what about seeing a witness in a dream? His vision has many interpretations that we will learn in our next article. The Witness in a Dream by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of seeing the Witness in a dream? Some interpreters say that seeing a martyr in a dream is a symbol of patriotism and the courage of insight. Scholars differed in the interpretation of this vision. Among them are those who believe that the witness in a dream is evidence of the great good that will come to the dreamer, and there is another group that believes that this dream is a sign of betrayal and treachery to which the dreamer will be exposed by these people. Around him. If the dreamer sees himself as a martyr, then this vision indicates his high status and position among the people, and that he will receive good and abundant food. If a man sees the grave of a martyr in a dream, the dream suggests that the dreamer helps others and likes to extend a helping hand to those in need. When he sees The dreamer himself is talking to a witness, the dream is good and indicates that he will hear a lot of happy news and his financial situation will improve for the better. The witness in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing a martyr in a dream, as interpreted by the scholar Ibn Sirin, indicates that it is a sign of the dreamer’s love for knowledge and knowledge, and that he uses All his knowledge is to help people and protect them. If the dreamer is someone who is lenient with God and sees a witness in the dream, then the vision is a warning for him to hasten his repentance and get closer to God again. Ibn Sirin also interpreted this vision by saying that the visionary was deceived and conspired by the people Those around him who were constantly trying to get close to him. Seeing a martyr in a dream symbolizes the disappearance of the dreamer’s worries and sorrows, and that he will live a calm and stable life after the crises and obstacles he went through. If a person sees in his dream that he is dying as a martyr, this is an indication of the stable life that he will live in The coming days and that he will live happily with his wife and if he seeks to achieve a certain goal or in a job, then the dream portends that he will succeed him. The witness in the dream of Imam Al-SadiqThe martyr in a dream, as interpreted by Imam Al-Sadiq, is an indication of the goodness and satisfaction that the dreamer will obtain, and a sign of the demise of The worry and pain that he was facing in his life. If the dreamer sees that he is standing at the grave of a martyr and praying over him, and he was going through trials and difficulties in his life, then this is a sign of the end of these ordeals and the vision symbolizes the good morals and reputation that the dreamer enjoys. Seeing a dying person indicates The success and excellence that he will achieve in his work, and that he will occupy high positions, and the dream indicates the large sums of money that he will earn from his work. The vision of walking in the funeral of a martyr symbolizes the good condition of the dreamer, and that he will obtain goodness, blessing, and abundance in his life, and that he is a person who draws closer to God through worship and good deeds. A specialized Egyptian website that includes a team of the best dream and vision translators in the world

title: Interpretation of windows in a dream Seeing a window in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a window for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, for a man, looking out the window, falling out of the window, breaking wide windows, washing windows, opening or closing a window according to Ibn Sirin and others. Seeing a window in a dream. Among the various dreams that we see in our dreams that cause us great anxiety and confusion to learn the correct interpretation of the vision, networks are among the things that exist in life in many different forms, and that are placed in our home in everything. Shapes and colors. There are many types of wood and other types, but if we see it in our dream, it brings many important clues and signals that we will explain to you correctly, as the commentator Ibn Sirin interpreted it in his interpretations. Interpretation of windows in dreamsWindows or nets in a dream: an important discovery. Quiet if the light comes in. The abundance of windows indicates the departure of tension and the finding of solutions to the problems that the dreamer suffers from in his life. Seeing looking through a window, opening and closing a window or a broken window, etc. They are indications, and we will rely on the interpretation of what the scholar Sheikh Muhammad bin Sirin mentioned in his book Interpretation of Great Dreams. Ibn Sirin narrated that seeing a person in his sleep as if looking out of the window is a sign of hearing news about a distant person, and seeing a lonely or terrifying sight from the window is a sign of bad news. Seeing a broken window or window indicates failure, failure and problems. As for seeing falling from the window, this reflects the dreamer’s recklessness and the problems he will face in life or exposure to dangers and obstacles. Interpretation of Al-Safi in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing the dreamer falling from the window in a dream. Evidence that the dreamer's position in public life will deteriorate significantly. The dreamer falling out of the window in the dream also indicates that his horror will change for the better in the next stage. Opening the window and looking at it in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will obtain a lot of goodness and money soon, and it also indicates It indicates that he will enter a new project and get a very famous position. Seeing a woman looking out the window in a dream at a big, expensive car also means that she will get what she saw in the dream and she will recover soon. Seeing a pregnant woman looking out the window also indicates that her birth will be easy in The near future and that she will be fine. Interpretation of an open window in a dream: Seeing an open window in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of hope and is one of the indicators that portends good things and indicates the end of a good emotional relationship. As for seeing an open window in a married woman’s dream, it is good news for sustenance, whether with money or children, and the end of pregnancy. As for seeing an open window in a pregnant woman’s dream, it is an indication of the nearness of the situation, and an open window in a man’s dream is an indication of a good woman or a world full of kindness. Interpretation Opening and closing a window in a dream. Seeing a window opening in a dream is an indication that the dreamer is starting a new job, and opening a window in a woman’s dream is evidence of kindness or the fulfillment of a desire she desires, such as seeing a car or a house.

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing rain in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing rain in a dreamRain in a dreamIn literary stories, rain symbolizes a romantic atmosphere, and in jurisprudence books it expresses prosperity and fertility, and seeing rain has special importance in the world of dreams. The rain can also be light, and the vision also varies depending on the viewer, whether he is a man, a married woman, or a single woman. What is important to us in this context is to mention all the indicators that are expressed by seeing rain. In a dream. Rain in a dream. Seeing rain in a dream means goodness, blessing, decent living, business prosperity, making profits, receiving years of prosperity, contentment, enjoyment, and enjoying great comfort and tranquility. Rain is a better interpretation as long as it does not cause shame. Its vision also expresses the completion of some work that has been stalled for a while. Long, or achieving many long-term goals, or achieving an absent destination or the return of a traveler after a long journey. If the dreamer sees rain in his dream, it symbolizes the end of disputes, breaking the wall of alienation, the victory of enemies, providing aid to those who need it, and the salvation of the anxious and afflicted. If he sees the sky raining, and the rain is in the form of swords, then this indicates empty arguments that harm people’s interests and do not benefit them, and the sadness that descends upon them, which makes the argument calm their hearts. Seeing rain, if it is general and not limited to a specific place, indicates goodness. And food and blessing, according to what God Almighty says: (And it is He who sends down the rain after despair and spreads His mercy.) “This vision is evidence of the removal of despair from hearts, the nearness of God’s comfort and reward, and the changing of conditions in the blink of an eye from drought and sadness to prosperity, fruitfulness and happiness. Whoever sees dark clouds and rain falling from them, this indicates fatigue, distress, many sorrows, bad choices, and deep regret for the decisions he made. The dreamer has taken it recently and is disappointed in the actions that he believes will relieve him a lot. Rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing rain in a dream by Ibn Sirin symbolizes joy, good news, happy occasions, the fall of divine mercy on His righteous servants, and obtaining benefits and spoils in this world and the hereafter. As Seeing rain indicates the pursuit of knowledge, the acquisition of knowledge, the possession of good qualities, the wisdom that distinguishes the dreamer in his dealings with others, the softness of the heart, and good morals. If a person sees rain in his dream, this indicates life and renewal, and liberation from the state of stagnation and routine that... Overshadows the opinion of the fortuneteller, and puts an end to the state of chaos and randomness that deprived him of many opportunities and offers that he would use to achieve all his desires and goals. And whoever sees rain falling, this shows the person who works on the earth and builds it, and takes the initiative to do good and removes despair and destruction from hearts that I have moved away from God Almighty. If the dreamer hears the sound of rain in his dream, this indicates intense focus and interest in everything big and small, and knowledge of all the information and data regarding the things that the dreamer wants to achieve and benefit from the amount of profit. If the fortuneteller is a merchant

title: Interpretation of a wedding dress in a dream - To see a wedding suit in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a wedding dress for single people, for married people, for pregnant women, for divorced women, for engaged women, whether worn, bought, worn, white, dirty, black, tight, wide, long, short, new, old, a torn white wedding dress and more by Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq and al-Nabul. The wedding dress. To dream of a dress. A wedding means a happy accident for the one who wears it. If it is torn, this means an unfortunate accident will occur during a ceremony or the end of a marriage or engagement project. Seeing a wedding dress in a dream is interpreted in two ways. It indicates that the bachelor has started a job that will make the family very happy. If a person is married, it shows one's happiness by initiating some recent actions. It is interpreted based on what was seen in the dream. If the garment is dirty and old, this indicates bad news. If it is clean and beautiful, it means happiness, obedience, and a long life full of happy news. Seeing a delicate dress indicates wealth, fortune and marriage to a respectable person. As for the vision of a tight dress in a dream, it indicates the effort expended in sustenance and earning through fatigue, but if it is a long dress, it shows old age and a blessed life, while a shiny dress shows the successful deeds that he performs in his life. Professional life. A married woman wearing a wedding dress in a dream expresses wonderful developments regarding marital life. Sometimes having children is shown, if a person has children, this indicates that they are good and respect their parents and have good morals. It also indicates that a person will marry a handsome, rich, and good person as soon as possible. Some scholars believe that it indicates old age, the pursuit of dreams, and solving one’s problems as quickly as possible. A married man wearing a wedding dress in a dream expresses some of the problems that a person will face in his professional and family life, and after a long period the person will achieve his dreams. Sometimes it shows the children one will have. In the opinion of some scholars, it indicates the death of a short-term illness and an event that will be sad for some time. Sometimes it indicates a successful business or modern improvement. The old lady wearing a wedding dress in a dream expresses the socially beloved individual getting into a problem from which it may be difficult to escape. In the opinion of some scholars, the term is close. Because whoever wears this dress does not suit them. An old woman wearing a dress indicates illness, closure, and success on the Day of Resurrection. Wearing a wedding dress in a dream expresses that a person gets something that he has been building his dreams for a long time. Sometimes it indicates exaggeration of family happiness, ease of living, tranquility and happiness between spouses. If a person quarrels with his wife, he will get rid of all these problems in the family and happiness and wonderful days will return again. Sometimes it indicates a quarrel with the spouse and a difference of opinion. Wearing a pure wedding dress in a dream expresses the wonderful results that one will get from the practices and projects that are implemented and one will succeed. A pure wedding dress always means good. It indicates intention
